Package org.lwjgl.util.opus

@NonnullDefault package org.lwjgl.util.opus
Contains bindings to the opus-codec library.
  • Class
    Description
    OGGPacket
    Layout
    OGGPacket.Buffer
    An array of OGGPacket structs.
    OPCloseFunc
    Instances of this class may be set to OpusFileCallbacks.
    OPCloseFuncI
    Instances of this interface may be set to OpusFileCallbacks.
    OPDecodeCBFunc
    Instances of this class may be passed to the OpusFile.op_set_decode_callback(long, org.lwjgl.util.opus.OPDecodeCBFuncI, long) method.
    OPDecodeCBFuncI
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the OpusFile.op_set_decode_callback(long, org.lwjgl.util.opus.OPDecodeCBFuncI, long) method.
    OPECloseFunc
    Instances of this class may be set to the OpusEncCallbacks.

    Opus.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the opus SharedLibrary.
    OpusCustom
    Opus Custom is an optional part of the Opus specification and reference implementation which uses a distinct API from the regular API and supports frame sizes that are not normally supported.
    OpusCustom.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from Opus.getLibrary().
    OpusEnc
    This is the documentation for the libopusenc C API.
    OpusEnc.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from Opus.getLibrary().
    OpusEncCallbacks
    Callback functions for accessing the stream.
    OpusEncCallbacks.Buffer
    An array of OpusEncCallbacks structs.
    OpusFile
    Introduction
    OpusFile.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from Opus.getLibrary().
    OpusFileCallbacks
    The callbacks used to access non-FILE stream resources.
    OpusFileCallbacks.Buffer
    An array of OpusFileCallbacks structs.
